label: Facility
comment: The physical site (eg farm or factory) where the product or materials was produced.

datatypeProperties.comment: The country in which this facility is operating.
The name of the facility, represented as a text string.
Geolocation and address information for this facility
The Party entity responsible for operating the facility.
An optional lsit of other registered identifiers for this organisations
The idustrial or production processes performed by this facility.
